ygData.subject: Re: Invisibility and jewelcraft
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, thanks for the post about Jewelcraft.  Do you have anything you might like to add for my page on jewelcraft?
ygData.messageBody:
Hi, thanks for the post about Jewelcraft. Do you have anything you
might like to add for my page on jewelcraft?

http://www.soldbuysam.com/shawn's_place/eq/everquest.asp

if you have prices, where you find materials, etc. I would be very
interested in adding that info. I haven't had a chance to look on other
sites etc. to consolidate info yet which I'll do pretty soon. I'd like
to have merchant locations in the various cities, good places to find
gems in loot, etc. And of course skill levels, fails/successes for
various components. If you look at the page you'll see the info I've
been collecting.

Thanks!
Shawn


<snip>
As for Jewelcraft, here's what I know


Stone Silver Electrum
Skill
Jade +5 mana ring ?
30+
malieche(?) non-magical +2 sv posion
bracers 35+
Lapis Lazuli non-magical +2 sv disease
earings 41+

Do note, the listed skill is not the bottom requirement, it's what I had
when I first tried making the item, so it may be possible to craft them
with lower skill, but not by much Im sure.
I am currently 49 skill and am working up my bank to get back to it.
I'll
post more when I have the info.



Telan Ka'Rlaah of Rellos Zeke
